alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Uintah County through 700 PM MDT... At 615 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Duchesne, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernal, Fort Duchesne, Naples, Randlett and Maeser. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Utah between mile markers 123 and 151. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 353 and 354. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
